Uses of Class
org.openimaj.image.objectdetection.haar.Stage

  • Packages that use Stage 
    Package Description
    org.openimaj.image.objectdetection.haar  

    • Uses of Stage in org.openimaj.image.objectdetection.haar

      Methods in org.openimaj.image.objectdetection.haar that return Stage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Stage Stage.failureStage()
      Get the next stage to evaluate should this one fail; if this stage fails and this is null then the whole StageTreeClassifier fails.
      Stage StageTreeClassifier.getRoot()
      Get the root Stage of the classifier
      Stage Stage.successStage()
      Get the next stage to evaluate should this one pass; if this stage passes and this is null then the whole StageTreeClassifier passes.
      Constructors in org.openimaj.image.objectdetection.haar with parameters of type Stage 
      Constructor and Description
      Stage(float threshold, Classifier[] trees, Stage successStage, Stage failureStage)
      Construct a new stage.
      StageTreeClassifier(int width, int height, String name, boolean hasTiltedFeatures, Stage root)
      Construct the StageTreeClassifier with the given parameters.
